1477460.name: Angels Pact: Reversal World
1477460.description:
The league has fractured, the angels' pact lies broken — welcome to Angels Pact: Reversal World, an epic idle MMORPG. Step into a world where the once-unified league splintered and destiny calls you to rebuild alliances, reclaim lost pacts, and fight for the fate of the realm.

Game Features

● Summon & Empower Divine Allies — Recruit dozens of celestial companions. Upgrade, reforge, and rebirth your angels to craft unstoppable teams. Strategic synergy decides the victors.

● Epic Boss Raids & Endless Loot — Take on world bosses and raids with friends or solo. High-value drops and divine gear await those who master the battlefield.

● 100+ Divine Weapons & Wing Sets — Collect and combine legendary weapons and wings that dramatically change your build and style. Swap attributes to optimize for any encounter.

● AFK Progression — Progress while you're away. AFK rewards let you return stronger every session.

● Climb the PvP Leaderboards — Rank, duel, and dominate seasonal arenas for unique rewards and glory.

● Stunning Character Art & Worldbuilding — Hand-crafted character designs and cinematic scenes that deepen the legend of the angels and the fractured league.
